title: Policy Analysis Toolkit Course
offered:
Terms offered: Fall 2017
This course is designed to improve our abilities to think creatively and critically about public policy problems and solutions. The course provides the opportunity to synthesize the skills you have acquired through your summer core coursework and apply these skills to real world policy problems. title: The Capstone
offered:
Terms offered: Spring 2018
The MPA Capstone Course is designed to enable each MPA student to write their Capstone Analytic Project, which will address a specific policy or programmatic challenge facing a real-world client. The weekly course meetings are structured to help students further hone their creativity, their analytic capacities and their writing and presentation skills as they develop the project through its various stages. title: Special Topics in Public Affairs
offered:
Terms offered: Spring 2018
Course examines current problems and issues in the field of public affairs. Topics may vary from year to year and will be announced at the beginning of the semester.
